com.broudy.gcm.boundary.fxmlControllers.welcome

Class WelcomeScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.enhanced.fxmlrelated.EnhancedFXMLController
      • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.fxmlControllers.welcome.WelcomeScreenController

  • public class WelcomeScreenController
extends EnhancedFXMLController
    Manages the welcome screen.
    The initialization of the IncomingMessageManager is done when this controller is instantiated for the first time.

    Created on the 5th of June, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy
    See Also:
    ClientMessagesReceiver, EnhancedFXMLLoaderDependenciesModule.configure()
